content.question: An object with mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> attached to a horizontal spring with spring constant <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>k</mi></math> undergoes simple harmonic motion with amplitude <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi></math> and period <math alttext="T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>T</mi></math>. Which of the following expressions is equal to the maximum speed of the block?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 4 A, over T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>T</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the square root of the fraction k over m, end square root, times A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mi>A</mi></math>
<math alttext="the fraction k over m, end fraction, times A squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi></mfrac><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

<math alttext="one half k times A squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction k over m, end square root, times A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mi>k</mi><mi>m</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mi>A</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
